originalTitle: Influential Ghanaian highlife musician Ebo Taylor dies at 90
title: Influential Ghanaian highlife musician Ebo Taylor dies at 90
content: The guitarist, composer and band leader fused Ghanaian music and funk to create tracks sampled around the world.

originalTitle: Ethiopia calls on Eritrea to pull its troops back to the border
title: Ethiopia calls on Eritrea to pull its troops back to the border
content: Eritrea has previously denied accusations that its soldiers are in Ethiopia supporting rebels.

originalTitle: Man named in South Africa's police corruption probe found dead
title: Man named in South Africa's police corruption probe found dead
content: Reports say Wiandre Pretorius, who last week said he survived an assassination attempt, shot himself.

originalTitle: Israel security cabinet approves rules to increase control over West Bank
title: Israel security cabinet approves rules to increase control over West Bank
content: The Palestinian presidency calls the decision a 'dangerous' Israeli 'attempt to legalize settlement expansion'.

originalTitle: Portugal elects Socialist Party’s Seguro as president in landslide
title: Portugal elects Socialist Party’s Seguro as president in landslide
content: With 95 percent of votes counted, 63-year-old Antonio Jose Seguro is on 66 percent.

originalTitle: T20 World Cup: Nepal fans light up Wankhede despite painful England loss
title: T20 World Cup: Nepal fans light up Wankhede despite painful England loss
content: From families crossing borders to fans dancing in the stands, Nepalese cricket fans created a carnival atmosphere.

originalTitle: Japan's PM Takaichi on course to win snap election by landslide
title: Japan's PM Takaichi on course to win snap election by landslide
content: Her ruling coalition is set to clinch a decisive win, taking two-thirds of the seats in the House of Representatives.

originalTitle: Thai PM claims election victory with conservatives well ahead of rivals
title: Thai PM claims election victory with conservatives well ahead of rivals
content: The ruling conservatives defied opinion polls predicting a win for the reformist People's Party.

originalTitle: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
title: Russia names three suspects in shooting of general
content: The suspects include the alleged gunman, Lyubomir Korba, whom Russia says fled to the UAE after the attack.

originalTitle: 'Killjoy' - did VAR get late drama in Liverpool v Man City right?
title: 'Killjoy' - did VAR get late drama in Liverpool v Man City right?
content: Manchester City's win at Liverpool ended in complete chaos - but did the referee and the VAR get Dominik Szoboszlai's red card right?

originalTitle: 'The hope is there' - how Man City 'just' kept themselves in title race
title: 'The hope is there' - how Man City 'just' kept themselves in title race
content: A generation of Manchester City supporters has not experienced a winning feeling at Anfield, but all that changed on a highly dramatic Sunday evening as they fought back for a thrilling 2-1 Premier League victory.

originalTitle: Celtic to host Rangers in Scottish Cup quarter-finals
title: Celtic to host Rangers in Scottish Cup quarter-finals
content: Rangers host Old Firm rivals Celtic and holders Aberdeen face a potential trip to Dunfermline in the Scottish Cup quarter-finals.
